vsParam:
Huh? Oh, it's you.
What's wrong? You came here for dinner?

No, we heard that the dragon is in Ateria.
Maybe we can find more information here...

Oh, that dragon. It hasn't made any move.
We got nothing for now.

But other monsters have been scared away or so agitated
that they're destroying everything. So tricky! Haha!

What's so funny about that!?
Have you been sitting by?

No worries. I've been preparing. We're not that
giant thing's match, so we can't confront it head-on.
I see... That makes investigation all the more necessary.

Investigation? I have no idea about your plan,
but I'm preparing to wipe out its den at one fling!
You should be be more careful...

Yeah, we almost know nothing about it. We can't get
fully prepared without figuring out its characteristics...

Wow, [px]!?
Which side are you on!?

I know you want to defeat it immediately...
But I think we'd better get fully prepared before that.

Haha! This is not good.
You're all so timid.

Such being the case, just help me get prepared.
I'll show you how capable my people are!

Um... Um...
Wh-what do we do? [px]...
Um... Either way, we need to get ready to defeat the dragon.
It doesn't hurt to conduct investigation while getting prepared.
Oh, you're right! Let's give that thing a good lesson!
No, please do no more than preparing for now...
Alright, please pack up some handy things, bombs or whatever!

Um... He just ignored what Sterk said!?
Forget it. We'd better get prepared, [px]...
